content.query:
USE EDW;
-- CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [STG_EDS3] WITH
-- (
-- 	LOCATION = 'https://synstg.blob.core.windows.net/syn-fs'--,CREDENTIAL= [sqlondemand]
-- );

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[DimCustomer] WITH (
        LOCATION = 'test/',
        DATA_SOURCE = [STG_EDS3],
        FILE_FORMAT = [DeltaLakeFormat]
) AS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'DimCustomer',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'STG_EDS2',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result]
